website_summaries.verdict: The beauty of natural bamboo with the extra strength and environmentally friendly impact the wood offers. A unique choice for people wanting something different in their kitchen.
pros: Comfortable curved handles are ergonomically designed to fit the hand
Elongated profile fits a mix of dishes for a single serving
cons: Unfinished wood requires extra care when cleaning and washing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Looks are deceiving. A regular sized dinner plate doesn't fit on here, and there isn't enough room for the items in the picture. Either they used kiddie plates, or they used a larger tray, but this picture is not accurate. Good quality, but I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: deneenc@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Standard size plate does not fit on tray
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have measured a plate ahead of time so, in a sense, the mistake is mine. However, don't order this item if you expect to use it for anything beside a bowl or a side dish. Picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised !!!
customer_reviews.text: The tray bottom is not bamboo but vinyl covered printed press board.
customer_reviews.author: HELMUT PREUSS

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I thought his was a dinner tray. It's too small to fit a dinner plate, which was a big disappointment. Also they need to give cleaning instructions, my husband clean this tray and the buttom got all bent up, and is falling out...it's like it's made of cardboard. ..I wasted my money here
customer_reviews.author: GDP-Mama

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cheap. And small. Laminate base is unimpressive and flimsy. I was hoping this would be a little nicer, and big enough to fit a regular size plate on. I guess for the price, it is what it is, but I would encourage you to spend more and get something higher quality, which is what I will do right now!
customer_reviews.author: Jermark

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast in Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of a serving tray, I ordered this so I can snack in bed while I binge Netflix. This way I won’t get any crumbs in bed, or if I spill a drink, the tray will catch it. This is the absolute perfect tray. It fits a drink, main meal, and utensils. It’s very lightweight (easy to move around my bed) and clean looking too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: whatpaigeesaid

customer_reviews.title: Not all bamboo
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is MDF, vinyl laminated and printed with a bamboo pattern. Very poor quality and not as described. Probably contains formaldehyde in the MDF. Steer clear. Sides are Bamboo. I'll most likely remove the bottom and put some 1/4 plywood in. Or just throw out.
customer_reviews.author: Barronlf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this tray, it's the perfect size and the price was very reasonable. It's a good quality sturdy wood in a nice neutral color. I needed a tray to hold my personal items so they're next to me when I'm relaxing on the couch. This tray is a perfect fit and holds everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenhair

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Look at the dimensions, doesn't fit a dinner plate. Picture they provide is not reality! Do NOT Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Doute

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy but ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: looks good.. i gave 4 stars bcos it doesnt look sturdy, light weight and the base not made of good wood its slim. it can hold two cup & saucers and 2 tea cups. Again quality depends on how much you pay for it, so do not expect a high end serving tray for such price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesu M.

customer_reviews.title: skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Picture is totally false. It shows a tray large enough to hold a dinner plate, a juice glass and two side plates. In actuality this is true only if the plates are doll-sized. I am thoroughly disappointed with this purchase and cannot believe the manufacturer would be so deceptive.. Definitely not worth even a fraction of its price. I am stuck with it however as I do not feel like repackaging it and making the trip to the post office to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lowndes24

customer_reviews.title: Greenco Rectangular Wood Serving Tray
customer_reviews.text: The tray was NOT big enough {9.75"} to accomidate my standard Corelle {10.25"} plates; see picture. Should have measured the plates and compared it to tray inside specifications. The manufacturer should have anticipated or tested different plates for "fit" before going to production. The company could have left some "wiggle" room to accomidate different sized plates. Now I'm stuck with two trays that I'm not happy with. Other than "size", everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a small serving tray
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than I expected. I purchased it for a dinner tray to use when my husband and I eat in the livingroom while watching TV. A normal size plate will not fit on it. That means most serving dishes wouldn't fit on it either. If you need a very small serving tray these are probably great for that.
customer_reviews.author: SRCurtsi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, cheap and not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is advertised as bamboo, but it is actually a cheap, thin, flimsy material painted to look like bamboo. It is also smaller than it appears in the pictures. You can’t even fit one full sized plate on it. The thin layer of wood that holds your items feels so cheap and thin that pressing on it with a rag to wipe it off feels as if the entire thing is going to fall through the bottom. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: When you buy something from Amazon for the first time based just on a small picture and a description, you can never be sure exactly what you're going to get. So, I was especially pleased at how this tray exceeded all my expectations. It's attractive, lightweight but not too light, has plenty of space for for all the items I want to carry but it's not too big. and the price is very reasonable. I can't think of any way it could've been improved.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Nirutam

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAMBOO
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as bamboo. The sides are bamboo but the bottom is cheap mpf board with bamboo print. I bought these for appetizer serving trays for a NYE event at my restaurant . I will not put food directly on them because I have no idea if the surface is food safe. I wanted bamboo because of its antibacterial properties, food safe and easy cleaning. These are garbage. False advertising. Amazon needs to do better at checking their vendors descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Great little tray!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tray! Exactly what I needed. I like to snack sitting on my couch. This keeps it all organized - I’m not making a million trips from my kitchen to couch anymore... okay, here are the snacks, now grab my drink... okay, napkins, fork, where’s the cell phone? No more of this nonsense. Sits perfectly on my couch. Love it. Easy to clean. Does smell weird when first unboxed. As with anything contacting food, be sure to wash it with soap and water before using. Smell dissipates once washed. No problem. Great little tray!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Love this beauty
customer_reviews.text: My tray arrived yesterday and I am so pleased with the protective packaging and medium light-weight and beauty of the bamboo as well as the size. Everything I dine on fits to perfection on this tray in my slender lap in my favorite chair. Very happy with this product and the price. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Good, almost great
customer_reviews.text: These are good. Does the job. Wooden sides. The only thing I’m disappointed about is the bottom seemed to be fake. Not actually wood but maybe some particle board or something. 3 stars for sturdiness because of that.
customer_reviews.author: kaushik parikh

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT lap tray
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Not too deep and just wide enough for your lap. And super light and sturdy as could only be done with bamboo. AND ... warm and organic feel as it sits on your lap because it is basically 'fiber'. Not cold like plastic. Get one, you'll see. Oh ... and the price was terrific. Am going to order another or several. My guests love it also.
customer_reviews.author: charles L. wood

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and misleading advertising -- bottom is particle board, not bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Bottom is a flimsy laminate veneer printed to look like bamboo. The company's name, "Greenco" sounds misleadingly environmental. It's Chinese ... that's all you need to know, sadly. I mean, bamboo is a cheap grass -- why not use the real thing? Disappointing cheap product, mis-advertised. The tray is not all bamboo, and the laminate bottom is thin and rattles in its slot. Very disppointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo is ALWAYS good because it doesn't hold water and germs can't linger
customer_reviews.text: We have had the same trays for years and were really skeptical about trying something new. We even ordered just one the first time to test it out. Haha. Instantly wound up ordering several more for back up in case we can't get these anymore! Bamboo is ALWAYS good because it doesn't hold water and germs can't linger! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PunkieBee

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Perfect. Bamboo.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Great little tray for your coffee table or to deliver food to someone in bed. Would be better if someone brought you food in bed, but I guess some people are selfish. Warning: It comes empty, not like the pictures above...
customer_reviews.author: ricothe2nd

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it appears
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and looks nice. However, the image is rather misleading, making it look as though the tray can accommodate a full-size plate, saucer, bowl, and even a glass of orange juice. The truth is that it is not large enough for a standard plate, and certainly can't hold all of those items at once. Sure, I could have read the dimensions and checked for myself in advance, but in the world of one-click ordering, we tend to focus on the immediacy of visuals, which in this case are misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and pretty trays!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for someone who has had surgery but wants to be able to carry her meals to her table or into her TV Room. They are really nice! I would order more of these for myself or as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Price

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last minute for my husband’s birthday (bed in breakfast). The price was awesome, quality is great and I love the color! I can’t complain. I will say, it is a little bit on the smaller side and our regular breakfast plates did not fit on it. Also, if you need lets for your tray in bed - obviously this is not the right fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Madden

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo??  Not entirely all bamboo and have as bottles of glue handy to make tray more durable and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Well it serves the purpose but it isn't all bamboo construction. The handles and sides are bamboo but the bottom appears to be MDF press board. Also the bottom tray is very loosely connected to the sides. It gives it a rattling sound as the base just slides in the routed slots. I fixed this issue by using word glue around the entire bottom edge to make the whole tray more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal for a great product
customer_reviews.text: What a nice e tray. I have trouble carrying anything weighted, but not with this tray! I have it on my little side table beside my little side table for now. It holds magazines, iPad/ phone, pens, books, very versatile. The color wood blends nicely with other different colored wood. And it’s so inexpensive! I’ll recommend it to friends, families, aquanauts, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, cheap, and perfect! Lightweight but durable. You can fit one full-size dinner plate and a glass or two, or fill it with snacks. I've had my fair share of "bed tables" and this is by far my favorite. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be useful for dinner
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be nice quality but too small to be useful for eating dinner. I bought this with the intention of sitting it on my lap while eating dinner in my living room recliner. As you can see from the picture, it is too small for a full-size dinner plate. Unfortunately I will be returning it for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: it’s good for the money
customer_reviews.text: the bottom part is thin so you have to be somewhat careful not to put to much weight on it..i do plan on buying a better one soon..
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Super Server
customer_reviews.text: This tray far exceeds the purchase price in quality, appearance, weight and practicality. It looks and feels like well crafted wood. It is large enough to accommodate a meal and small enough to fit almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Since it has a large plate on the ad, ...
customer_reviews.text: Since it has a large plate on the ad, I will tell you a large plate does not fit. It is deceptive. This is ok for a small plate and drink, maybe a bowl of fruit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table or Bed Tray
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold all the random things on my coffee table or bed (it can hold books, colored pencils, food, really anything). It looks great anywhere! I have also used it as a cheese board a few times. I would recommend or buy again!
customer_reviews.author: mk342

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tray, but smaller than picture
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo is lovely and design is great, but the tray is smaller than featured on the picture. The picture shows it fitting a full size dinner plate, cup and saucer. When I opened the package, the trays was too small to fit even a regular size dinner plate. I'm returning and looking for a bigger size. Other than that the tray is real nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful little tray
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little tray, little being the key word! I love the way it's made and it's pretty to use as a serving tray for small dishes or drinks! I can not fit a dinner plate on this like in the picture! Way too small to use the way it's shown. They had to use a larger tray to fit all that stuff on there or used extra small dinnerware. Great price if you need a "small tray."
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: Fake bamboo tray
customer_reviews.text: This is not real bamboo this is really card board. I had a some sticky juice on the tray I sprayed all purpose cleaner that have bleach in it on the tray and the spray ate the paint off and expose the cardboard under the paint fake bamboo look. This product should be priced at 5.99 real bamboo a joke
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but fake-wood base make tray feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Sides appear to be real bamboo. But tray base appears to be made of bamboo-print contact paper over cardboard or other composite. Tray is well made, but just feels & looks cheap because of the non-real wood bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking bamboo tray for appetizers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to place drink glasses qhen i invite people over or serve as an appetizer tray. Came nicely packed withput any damage and very nice classy looking tray. Its light so not adviseable to carry heavy pyrex casserole dishes unless used stationary. Yet, it still seems durable. It works for the purposr i need it for. Added pictures. The leather armchaor is full sized chunky one from Havertys so to compare size of this tray.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: Should have ordered the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Much too small for our use. Should have ordered the larger version. Not worth sending back, as the return shipping was half as much as the tray. So I'm keeping it. Probably can use for setting out appetizers, but it's not big enough for a full meal or breakfast in bed, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A. Camerota

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the most part i always am happy with the items i get but nit sute if just a bad one that was sent out or what i tried it out and held it from bottom and got splinters in my fingers and hands its like they forgot to sand it before sending it out long story short not happy
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Greenco Rectangle Bamboo Butler Serving Tray with Handles
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome. I got one for my self and two for my parents... We are all disabled and sit in our chairs in front of the TV. The Trays are wonderful great for carrying our meals on and eating off of. The trays are attractive and could have many uses, but this is our choice of using.
customer_reviews.author: Sally's Review

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Disappointed that it can’t hold/fit a normal size dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: M Tw

customer_reviews.title: Works for salads and appetizers
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a standard plate so recommend that you don't order if you expect to serve dinner with these trays. Keeping them for serving salads, soups and appetizers. The wood is nice. Too bad it won't fit a dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Boone

customer_reviews.title: Eat at the TV!
customer_reviews.text: With kids gone, we rarely eat at the table, almost always at the TV. These are solid, easy to clean, fit most dishes, much better than balancing a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Veneer wears quickly
customer_reviews.text: This looked fine for a while, but after a year the veneer is wearing. I guess if you don’t use it much or set anything wet on it you’d be ok. We use it for drinks and such. Definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Winger

customer_reviews.title: Great tray!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I needed something to put on my bed to hold my drink and remote etc. when I’m laying down at night watching TV. This is perfect. Well made and sturdy too. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: mothang

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship and versatility come at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it better 2” longer and 3” wider. It is versatile to use anywhere in the house/ breakfast in bed, eating while watching tv to avoid messing up the couch or giving snack to a child
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot of money for a simple tray so this is perfect. It is sturdier than I thought it would be, and also very cute, looks very nice. I like to sit on my fluffy area rug in the game room with pillows and blankets so it's the perfect thing to set right next to me so I can keep my drinks and snacks near by without having to get up and go to the table.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not bamboo. Not cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of tray (main component) is PLASTIC with a woodgrain printed on it. Bought this because it was supposed to be BAMBOO. Notttt cooollll mannnnn. I opened it after the return period. I'm stuck with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for any dinner plate.
customer_reviews.text: Photo is deceptive. This tray is too small to hold any of my dinner plates. (Bread or dessert plats or bowls only.) Otherwise, its a nice tray for the money if you don't need one for a dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: Verified

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Small if your looking for a serving tray you can use with the average size plate go lager. It will no fit inside this one. I gave it to my 7 year old granddaughter work well for her.
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted almost a year. I've had it since maybe may and now it's February. The tray is nice looking and light weight but now the finish is coming off of it and it feels brittle like it may break any day now. Honestly wish I'd gotten something more heavy duty than bamboo because I have to get a new one now!
customer_reviews.author: maureen grigereit

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, handsome, good size
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, handsome, and just the right size to fit in my cupboard. Features nice handle slots on the side, plus the cleanability and eco-consciousness of bamboo. I bought 2 and may get more
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Light weight; yet sturdy. Great size for average plate size. I love using tray to bring food to bed or while watching TV. Would purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to enjoy dinner in bed from time to time. It’s great -not to large or to small-perfect for coffee tray in the morning as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This product looks just like the picture however, it doesn't even fit a regular plate(plastic, etc.).Get measurements of your dishes before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondG

customer_reviews.title: Great for my need
customer_reviews.text: I use this tray frequently. Since I'm on a knee scooter, the size and sturdiness are welcome as I can prepare food and carry it to the table with little fear of spilling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Get Served
customer_reviews.text: I like this tray....it serves it's purpose. I like the size and that's it's not real heavy, perfect for breakfast in bed and cleans up easily
customer_reviews.author: Peepchick

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: This tray is so small that I couldn't fit a standard sized dinner plate on it. It was terrible a d unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Loving my life

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lovely but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The flat surface was way too narrow. Would not hold standard 10" dinner plate. It teetered on the edge. Plate in picture is a salad plate. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit normal sized plate
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit a normal sized plate. My fault for not checking the measurements? I just assumed a tray for this purpose would fit a normal size plate. Other than that, it would’ve been a five star if it fitted a normal sized plate
customer_reviews.author: jvue11

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it if you're looking for basic but nice trays.
customer_reviews.text: These are great trays, especially for the price. I use them all the time to either bring things from the kitchen or to eat on if we're outside or in another room. Very nice wood, good construction and have held up nicely to repeated use. Definitely worth it if you're looking for basic but nice trays.
customer_reviews.author: BASE 5_NYCTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Average Product
customer_reviews.text: Too small for big size plate and the bamboo is starting to come off now only after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Dao Tran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lap tray
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tray for my husband who likes to eat on the couch. I liked it so much that I bought one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected because when my wife ordered them we focused on quality not size
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tray for my giant ottoman in living room. Thought of using it for put a glass of water or some snack when I watch tv. However, tray quality is bad cannot hold anything and not even think about to use as a serving tray. There's a gap between one side of handle and bottom of tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but be precautious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tray especially so that I could enjoy some food in bed without crumbs and spills. It's cute and it does the job BUT little wood shavings come off every now and then. Splinter disaster waiting to happen. I have white sheets so luckily I'm able to spot them. Other than that its an excellent tray, maybe just don't use it in the bed like me :)
customer_reviews.author: Njos

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsey
customer_reviews.text: The bottom broke out of the one I bought. It is lightweight, which feels more like flimsy. The size is a bit small for a standard dinner plate.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Folse

customer_reviews.title: Lap Tray
customer_reviews.text: Very nice come as set of two. Just too small for what I needed it for . Item was returned
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Handy food transport
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size to carry one serving of food into another room. The rim helps avoid dishes sliding off and it doesn't add to the weight of the food. All are important features if you are navigating a wheelchair with the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: jw6902

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you want a small tray
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very deceiving. It is a SMALL tray. The dishes shown had to be very small and not normal size. I will keep because I will use mine only to hold drinks or a small bowl or plate. Very well made. Be sure to check out measurements before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Imqt2818

customer_reviews.title: Use it handles up for a tray, or handles down for a desk!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on strict bed rest due to pregnancy complications. I bought this tray to make eating meals easier, a lap-sized area to hold projects I’m working on, and I flip it upside-down to use as a lap desk. It’s versatile, & perfect for my needs at this time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I eat it's a great way to not spill your food or makeup on the bed. I would use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tray. It is not big enough for regular sized plates. Probably good for toast and cereal bowls and a coffee cup. Was not what I was expecting. A bit disappointed. But still keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Sprite

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: If you want a nice looking serving tray at a reasonable cost, this may be for you. Bamboo is very durable and the tray cleans up with a wet cloth. Its really nice for moving plates, bowls, silver, glasses as well as food.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: A big disappointment while the measurements are listed the pictures used lead to believe you can fit many things on this I can barely fit a regular sized plate on this along side utensils and a very small cup and i mean that it barely fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow otherwise nice
customer_reviews.text: It is nice but way to narrow. A regular plate won’t fit. Only saucers 😉
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small! Not as they appear in picture
customer_reviews.text: These are really small. Good for a soup bowl. A regular dinner plate will not fit!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Great tray!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tray Easy to carry Perfect and manageable for any need
customer_reviews.author: SAUNDRA D.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but are ok .-Need to be most resisting but the corner can broke easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye-pleasing
customer_reviews.text: The proper word to describe this tray is...elegant.. The appearance of whatever may be served on it will be enhanced by its simple, graceful lines and eye-pleasing construction. And when all surfaces, top, bottom, sides and handles are smooth as ice...that's elegance. . .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Myron Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Service with a Smile
customer_reviews.text: Simple, perfectly sized, and lightweight. Just what I needed to serve up my husband's dinner when he gets home from work. Plus, it keeps him from spilling everything all over the place when he gets messy. :)
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Is totally what we wanted. Very sturdy handles. Quality made. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: John David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to clean. Product was smaller than I thought it'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good for small things
customer_reviews.text: Good for small things this is perfect for me and my partner we live in an apartment with roommates and we don’t have a dinning area and these are perfect for us light weight and sturdy! Only giving 4 stars because it’s smaller than expected and a bit pricey for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sever tray because my wife has to eat her recliner. It holds our oblong dinner plates perfectly. They don’t slip off of my wife’s lap. We have two of these trays. The other one we keep her medicine on it,it comes in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Handy tray
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and as described, good quality, sturdy. size is exactly as described so don't expect a big one for heavy duty. Nice to hold one person's meal.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% bamboo
customer_reviews.text: This tray is not 100% bamboo. The bottom of the tray is pressboard . It looks cheap and will not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy but lightweight trsy👏👏
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, this tray is very sturdy. Great size. I’m using it for my coffee area and it’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Di Lieto

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This is too small!! A regular diner plate don’t even fit smh .. looks are deceiving with this product. If u doing to use this for only Coffee then it’s a good size sorta but it’s not worth almost $12.00
customer_reviews.author: Ires D

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% Bamboo
customer_reviews.text: It’s claimed that the tray is “Made of durable natural bamboo known to be environmentally friendly, stronger and more beautiful than regular wood.“. The tray is NOT 100% bamboo. The most important part of the tray, the base, is laminated. Hardly used the tray and it’s already peeling. Unfortunately, the return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It's a tray, it looks just like the pictures. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Product not bad for small items
customer_reviews.text: This item was a little smaller than what I was looking for. Overall well built and good for small plates.
customer_reviews.author: Flaskia Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Fluid painting trays
customer_reviews.text: These are decent quality. I have been using them to make fluid painting trays. On a few I’ve noticed the corners don’t quite line up exactly but nothing too bad. Good for $10
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Painted mine! Works for what I use it for! (Decor)
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Too small for plates
customer_reviews.text: Their picture is deceiving . they must have used Photoshop. Regular size plates do not fit inside of tray. Spend 5 more dollar and get a full size tray. Bottom of tray is very flimsy .
customer_reviews.author: samuel king

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s easy to handle and it’s light weight and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Fathalla

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Photo uses dessert plate, saucer, juice glass. Ok for a lap tray for small ipad or notebook or for writing desk. I didn’t notice the dimensions listed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Held up well to paint.
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo tray was just perfect! I used it as a base for a present I made for a dear friend. I would definitely order it again for future projects
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

product_meta.title: Greenco Rectangle Bamboo Butler Serving Tray With Handles
product_meta.description: Size:Pak of 1Add an elegant touch of bamboo style to your home interior with this classy serving tray.This tray can be used either as a server or a decoration holder. Whether it's breakfast, appetizers, or wine glasses, spoil your guests by serving them with this platter. Or, show off your favorite candles, keepsakes, and more on its smooth surface. Bring sophisticated bamboo design to your life with this convenient and stylish serving tray.
feature_bullets: Made of durable natural bamboo known to be environmentally friendly, stronger and more beautiful than regular wood.
Ideal for serving breakfast, dinner, wine, or just anything else, or use for an elegant decoration display.
Elegant sides with wide handles for easy grip. Surrounding tray lips prevent items from falling over.
Hand wash with mild soap warm water, for extended life of tray use bamboo oil occasionally.
Tray measures approximately 16.5 L x 10.5 L x 2.35 H inches.
